targets.expr:
sum by(uri, outcome, method) (
    increase(http_server_requests_seconds_sum[$__range])
)
/ 
sum by(uri, outcome, method) (
    increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count[$__range])
)

label_replace(
    sum by (method, uri, exception, status, job) (
        increase(
            http_server_requests_seconds_count{status=~"5..|400|499"}[$__range]
        )
    ) > 0, 
    'uri', 
    '$1/*$2', 
    'uri', 
    '(.*)\\/\\{.+\\}(.*)'
)
